languages.text: "Хищные, жестокие, опасные твари. Ксеносы обычно не цацкаются с людьми — для них мы развлечение, способ развеять скуку, товар... Но иногда некоторые из них выходят на связь — через своих людей. Не обманывайте себя мыслью о том, что, раз вы не видите ксеносов среди нас, то вы в безопасности. Эти ажи столь же хитры, сколь и кровожадны: они искусно пользуются шпионами и предателями среди нашего числа, подчиняют своей воле тех, кто не польстился на награду, превращают в бездушных марионеток тех, кто выстоял против их посулов... Меня хранит {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g} и потому я до сих пор не повторила судьбу многих своих коллег, расставшихся с жизнью из-за долговязых мерзавцев".

traits.locale_text: "Хищные, жестокие, опасные твари. Ксеносы обычно не цацкаются с людьми — для них мы развлечение, способ развеять скуку, товар... Но иногда некоторые из них выходят на связь — через своих людей. Не обманывайте себя мыслью о том, что, раз вы не видите ксеносов среди нас, то вы в безопасности. Эти ажи столь же хитры, сколь и кровожадны: они искусно пользуются шпионами и предателями среди нашего числа, подчиняют своей воле тех, кто не польстился на награду, превращают в бездушных марионеток тех, кто выстоял против их посулов... Меня хранит {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g} и потому я до сих пор не повторила судьбу многих своих коллег, расставшихся с жизнью из-за долговязых мерзавцев".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Vicious, cruel, dangerous beasts. Humans hold little interest for xenos — we are entertainment for them, a means to keep boredom at bay, a commodity... But some of them contact us once in a while using their own people. Do not deceive yourself by thinking you are safe because there are no xenos in sight. Those azhi are as cunning as they are ruthless: they cleverly pull at the strings of spies and traitors, subjugate those who do not fall for the promised reward, transform the ones who resist their promises into soulless puppets... The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} watches over me, and that is why I still haven't succumbed to the fate of many of my associates who have lost their lives to the stringy scoundrels."
languages.original_text: "Хищные, жестокие, опасные твари. Ксеносы обычно не цацкаются с людьми — для них мы развлечение, способ развеять скуку, товар... Но иногда некоторые из них выходят на связь — через своих людей. Не обманывайте себя мыслью о том, что, раз вы не видите ксеносов среди нас, то вы в безопасности. Эти ажи столь же хитры, сколь и кровожадны: они искусно пользуются шпионами и предателями среди нашего числа, подчиняют своей воле тех, кто не польстился на награду, превращают в бездушных марионеток тех, кто выстоял против их посулов... Меня хранит {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g} и потому я до сих пор не повторила судьбу многих своих коллег, расставшихся с жизнью из-за долговязых мерзавцев".

traits.locale_text: "Vicious, cruel, dangerous beasts. Maadari do not mollycoddle humans — we are an entertainment for them, a means to keep boredom at bay, a commodity... But some of them contact us once in a while using their own people. Do not deceive yourself by thinking you are safe because there are no maadari in sight. These daevas are as cunning as they are ruthless: they cleverly pull at the strings of spies and traitors, subjugate those who did not fall for the promised reward, transform the ones who resist their promises into soulless puppets... The Great One watches over me, and this is why I still haven't succumbed to the fate of many of my colleagues who lost their lives to the lanky scoundrels."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Vicious, cruel, dangerous beasts. Maadari do not mollycoddle humans — we are an entertainment for them, a means to keep boredom at bay, a commodity... But some of them contact us once in a while using their own people. Do not deceive yourself by thinking you are safe because there are no maadari in sight. traits.locale_text: "Vicious, cruel, dangerous beasts. Humans hold little interest for maadari — we are entertainment for them, a means to keep boredom at bay, a commodity... But some of them contact us once in a while using their own people. Do not deceive yourself by thinking you are safe because there are no maadari in sight. Those divs are as cunning as they are ruthless: they cleverly pull at the strings of spies and traitors, subjugate those who do not fall for the promised reward, transform the ones who resist their promises into soulless puppets... The Exalted One watches over me, and that is why I still haven't succumbed to the fate of many of my associates who have lost their lives to the stringy scoundrels."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Vicious, cruel, dangerous beasts. Humans hold little interest for maadari — we are entertainment for them, a means to keep boredom at bay, a commodity... Those azhi are as cunning as they are ruthless: they cleverly pull at the strings of spies and traitors, subjugate those who do not fall for the promised reward, transform the ones who resist their promises into soulless puppets... The Emperor watches over me, and that is why I still haven't succumbed to the fate of many of my associates who have lost their lives to the stringy scoundrels."

Those azhi are as cunning as they are ruthless: they cleverly pull at the strings of spies and traitors, subjugate those who do not fall for the promised reward, transform the ones who resist their promises into soulless puppets... traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “他们是一群恶毒、残忍、危险的畜生。异形对人类没什么兴趣，我们对他们而言，仅仅是玩物而已，是用来打发无聊时间的手段，也是商品……不过，他们之中的一部分，偶尔会通过他们在人类之中的代理人与我们取得联系。不要自欺欺人，别以为没看到异形就代表很安全。那些鬼怪既狡猾、又无情，他们在幕后巧妙地操纵着那些间谍与叛徒，征服那些不为他们的奖赏所动的人，把那些胆敢违逆他们意愿的人变成没有灵魂的傀儡……我有不少合作人都被那些阴魂不散的恶棍夺去了性命。感谢{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}保佑，我还没有落得同样的下场。”
languages.original_text: "Vicious, cruel, dangerous beasts. Humans hold little interest for xenos — we are entertainment for them, a means to keep boredom at bay, a commodity... But some of them contact us once in a while using their own people. Do not deceive yourself by thinking you are safe because there are no xenos in sight. Those azhi are as cunning as they are ruthless: they cleverly pull at the strings of spies and traitors, subjugate those who do not fall for the promised reward, transform the ones who resist their promises into soulless puppets... The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} watches over me, and that is why I still haven't succumbed to the fate of many of my associates who have lost their lives to the stringy scoundrels."

languages.original_text: "Vicious, cruel, dangerous beasts. Humans hold little interest for xenos — we are entertainment for them, a means to keep boredom at bay, a commodity... But some of them contact us once in a while using their own people. Do not deceive yourself by thinking you are safe because there are no xenos in sight. Those azhi are as cunning as they are ruthless: they cleverly pull at the strings of spies and traitors, subjugate those who do not fall for the promised reward, transform the ones who resist their promises into soulless puppets... The Emperor watches over me, and that is why I still haven't succumbed to the fate of many of my associates who have lost their lives to the stringy scoundrels."

languages.text: «Bestias crueles, salvajes y peligrosas. Los humanos no son muy interesantes para los xenos, pero sí una especie de entretenimiento, una forma de evitar el aburrimiento, un producto... aunque algunos entran en contacto de vez en cuando a través de su propia gente. No se engañe creyendo que está a salvo porque no hay xenos a la vista. Los azhi son tan astutos como implacables: tiran de los hilos de espías y traidores, subyugan a todos los que no se creen la recompensa prometida, transforman a los que rechazan sus promesas en marionetas sin alma... El {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} me protege, y creo que ese es el único motivo por el que no he sucumbido al mismo destino que muchos de mis asociados, que ha perdido la vida por culpa de esos canallas fibrosos».
languages.original_text: "Vicious, cruel, dangerous beasts. Humans hold little interest for xenos — we are entertainment for them, a means to keep boredom at bay, a commodity... But some of them contact us once in a while using their own people. Do not deceive yourself by thinking you are safe because there are no xenos in sight. Those azhi are as cunning as they are ruthless: they cleverly pull at the strings of spies and traitors, subjugate those who do not fall for the promised reward, transform the ones who resist their promises into soulless puppets... The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} watches over me, and that is why I still haven't succumbed to the fate of many of my associates who have lost their lives to the stringy scoundrels."

traits.locale_text: «Bestias crueles, salvajes y peligrosas. Los humanos no son muy interesantes para los xenos, pero sí una especie de entretenimiento, una forma de evitar el aburrimiento, un producto... aunque algunos entran en contacto de vez en cuando a través de su propia gente. No se engañe creyendo que está a salvo porque no hay xenos a la vista. Los azhi son tan astutos como implacables: tiran de los hilos de espías y traidores, subyugan a todos los que no se creen la recompensa prometida, transforman a los que rechazan sus promesas en marionetas sin alma... El {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} me protege, y creo que ese es el único motivo por el que no he sucumbido al mismo destino que muchos de mis asociados, que ha perdido la vida por culpa de esos canallas fibrosos».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「凶暴で、残酷で、危険な獣さ。人間は異種族にはほとんど興味を示さない…アタシらは連中にとっては娯楽であり、退屈しのぎであり、商品なんだ。だが、たまに部下を使って接触してくるものもいる。異種族人がいないから安全だと思って、自分をごまかさないようにね。あのアジーはズル賢く、無慈悲だ…連中はスパイや裏切り者の糸を巧みに引き、約束の報酬にありつけない者を服従させ、約束に抵抗する者を魂のない操り人形に変える…{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}がアタシを見守っていてくださるからこそ、筋金入りの悪党どもに命を奪われた多くの仲間と同じ運命に、アタシはいまだに屈していないのさ」
languages.original_text: "Vicious, cruel, dangerous beasts. Humans hold little interest for xenos — we are entertainment for them, a means to keep boredom at bay, a commodity... But some of them contact us once in a while using their own people. Do not deceive yourself by thinking you are safe because there are no xenos in sight. Those azhi are as cunning as they are ruthless: they cleverly pull at the strings of spies and traitors, subjugate those who do not fall for the promised reward, transform the ones who resist their promises into soulless puppets... The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} watches over me, and that is why I still haven't succumbed to the fate of many of my associates who have lost their lives to the stringy scoundrels."

traits.locale_text: 「凶暴で、残酷で、危険な獣さ。人間は異種族にはほとんど興味を示さない…アタシらは連中にとっては娯楽であり、退屈しのぎであり、商品なんだ。だが、たまに部下を使って接触してくるものもいる。異種族人がいないから安全だと思って、自分をごまかさないようにね。あのアジーはズル賢く、無慈悲だ…連中はスパイや裏切り者の糸を巧みに引き、約束の報酬にありつけない者を服従させ、約束に抵抗する者を魂のない操り人形に変える…{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}がアタシを見守っていてくださるからこそ、筋金入りの悪党どもに命を奪われた多くの仲間と同じ運命に、アタシはいまだに屈していないのさ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Grausame, brutale, gefährliche Monster. Menschen sind für Xenos von keinem großen Interesse — wir sind für sie nur Unterhaltung, ein Mittel gegen die Langeweile, eine Ware ... Doch manche kontaktieren uns gelegentlich über ihre eigenen Leute. Macht Euch nicht vor, dass Ihr sicher seid, nur weil keine Xenos in Sicht sind. Diese Azhi sind so gerissen wie gnadenlos: Sie ziehen geschickt die Strippen von Spionen und Verrätern, unterwerfen alle, die nicht auf die versprochene Belohnung hereinfallen, verwandeln jene, die sich ihren Versprechungen widersetzen, in seelenlose Marionetten ... Der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} wacht über mich. Nur darum hat mich noch nicht das Schicksal vieler anderer ereilt, die von den geizigen Schurken getötet wurden."
languages.original_text: "Vicious, cruel, dangerous beasts. Humans hold little interest for xenos — we are entertainment for them, a means to keep boredom at bay, a commodity... But some of them contact us once in a while using their own people. Do not deceive yourself by thinking you are safe because there are no xenos in sight. Those azhi are as cunning as they are ruthless: they cleverly pull at the strings of spies and traitors, subjugate those who do not fall for the promised reward, transform the ones who resist their promises into soulless puppets... The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} watches over me, and that is why I still haven't succumbed to the fate of many of my associates who have lost their lives to the stringy scoundrels."

traits.locale_text: "Grausame, brutale, gefährliche Monster. Menschen sind für Xenos von keinem großen Interesse — wir sind für sie nur Unterhaltung, ein Mittel gegen die Langeweile, eine Ware ... Doch manche kontaktieren uns gelegentlich über ihre eigenen Leute. Macht Euch nicht vor, dass Ihr sicher seid, nur weil keine Xenos in Sicht sind. Diese Azhi sind so gerissen wie gnadenlos: Sie ziehen geschickt die Strippen von Spionen und Verrätern, unterwerfen alle, die nicht auf die versprochene Belohnung hereinfallen, verwandeln jene, die sich ihren Versprechungen widersetzen, in seelenlose Marionetten ... Der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} wacht über mich. Nur darum hat mich noch nicht das Schicksal vieler anderer ereilt, die von den geizigen Schurken getötet wurden."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Ce sont des bêtes brutales, cruelles et dangereuses. Les humains ne présentent guère d'intérêt pour les xénos. Nous sommes une forme de divertissement pour eux, un simple moyen de chasser l'ennui... Mais de temps en temps, certains nous contactent par l'intermédiaire de leurs propres agents. N'allez pas vous croire en sécurité parce qu'il n'y a aucun xénos en vue. Ces azhi sont aussi rusés qu'impitoyables : ils tirent les ficelles des espions et des traîtres, ils soumettent ceux qui ne sont pas alléchés par la récompense promise et transforment ceux qui résistent en pantins décérébrés... Si j'échappe encore et toujours au sort de beaucoup de mes associés qui ont perdu la vie aux mains de ces scélérats, c'est uniquement parce que l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} veille sur moi. »
languages.original_text: "Vicious, cruel, dangerous beasts. Humans hold little interest for xenos — we are entertainment for them, a means to keep boredom at bay, a commodity... But some of them contact us once in a while using their own people. Do not deceive yourself by thinking you are safe because there are no xenos in sight. Those azhi are as cunning as they are ruthless: they cleverly pull at the strings of spies and traitors, subjugate those who do not fall for the promised reward, transform the ones who resist their promises into soulless puppets... The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} watches over me, and that is why I still haven't succumbed to the fate of many of my associates who have lost their lives to the stringy scoundrels."

traits.locale_text: « Ce sont des bêtes brutales, cruelles et dangereuses. Les humains ne présentent guère d'intérêt pour les xénos. Nous sommes une forme de divertissement pour eux, un simple moyen de chasser l'ennui... Mais de temps en temps, certains nous contactent par l'intermédiaire de leurs propres agents. N'allez pas vous croire en sécurité parce qu'il n'y a aucun xénos en vue. Ces azhi sont aussi rusés qu'impitoyables : ils tirent les ficelles des espions et des traîtres, ils soumettent ceux qui ne sont pas alléchés par la récompense promise et transforment ceux qui résistent en pantins décérébrés... Si j'échappe encore et toujours au sort de beaucoup de mes associés qui ont perdu la vie aux mains de ces scélérats, c'est uniquement parce que l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} veille sur moi. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Vahşi, zalim, tehlikeli hayvanlardır. İnsanlar, zenoların pek umurunda değildir. Onlar için yalnızca bir eğlence, sıkıntılarını gidermekte kullanabilecekleri emtialarız. Arada sırada bazıları, kendi türlerinden birileri aracılığıyla bizimle irtibata geçer. Etrafta zeno göremiyorsun diye kendini güvende hissetmek gibi bir hataya sakın düşme. Bu azhiler, acımasız oldukları kadar kurnazdırlar da. Zekâlarıyla casusların ve hainlerin iplerini ellerinde tutar, vadettikleri armağanlarla insanları hükümleri altına alır, vaatlerine direnenleri ise ruhsuz birer kuklaya çevirirler. {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} korudu da o kikiriklerin elinde can veren sayısız tanıdığımın kaderini paylaşmadım."
languages.original_text: "Vicious, cruel, dangerous beasts. Humans hold little interest for xenos — we are entertainment for them, a means to keep boredom at bay, a commodity... But some of them contact us once in a while using their own people. Do not deceive yourself by thinking you are safe because there are no xenos in sight. Those azhi are as cunning as they are ruthless: they cleverly pull at the strings of spies and traitors, subjugate those who do not fall for the promised reward, transform the ones who resist their promises into soulless puppets... The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} watches over me, and that is why I still haven't succumbed to the fate of many of my associates who have lost their lives to the stringy scoundrels."

traits.locale_text: "Vahşi, zalim, tehlikeli hayvanlardır. İnsanlar zenoların pek umurunda değildir, onlar için yalnızca bir eğlence, sıkıntılarını gidermek için kullanabilecekleri bir eşyayız. Arada sırada kendi türlerinden birilerini kullanan bazıları bizimle irtibata geçer ama. Etrafta zeno göremiyorsun diye kendini güvende hissetmek gibi bir hataya sakın düşme. Bu azhiler acımasız oldukları kadar kurnazdırlar da. Zekâlarıyla casusların ve hainlerin iplerini ellerinde tutar, vadettikleri armağanlarla insanları hükümleri altına alır, vaatlerine direnenleri ise ruhsuz birer kuklaya çevirirler. {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} korudu da o alçak kılçıklara yaşamını kaybeden sayısız tanıdığımın kaderini hâlâ paylaşmadım."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
